r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.3M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with Horseshoe Hill Construction. The average
  contract duration was 3.1 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $7.3M. The longest
  contract was 3.1 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $7.3M.
lookup_name: 'HORSESHOE HILL CONSTRUCTION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2019-2020'
s431_number_of_contracts: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-4%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-273.2K'
s424_mean_duration: '3.1'
s421_mean_contract_value: '7.3M'
s425_max_duration: '3.1'
s422_max_contract_value: '7.3M'
